# ui.css.as_css_padding { #shiny.ui.css.as_css_padding }

`ui.css.as_css_padding(padding)`

Convert a CSS unit or list of CSS units into a CSS padding value.

## Parameters

<code><span class="parameter-name">padding</span><span class="parameter-annotation-sep">:</span> <span class="parameter-annotation">[CssUnit](`shiny.ui.css._css_unit.CssUnit`) \| [list](`list`)\[[CssUnit](`shiny.ui.css._css_unit.CssUnit`)\] \| None</span></code>

:   A CSS unit or list of CSS units.

## Returns

| Type                 | Description          |
|----------------------|----------------------|
| [str](`str`) \| None | A CSS padding value. |

## Examples

```{python}
from shiny.ui.css import as_css_padding

as_css_padding([0, "1em"])
```
